Race.SpecificTitle: Recreation District No. 3 -- 4 1/2 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
RECREATION DISTRICT NO. 3 PROPOSITION

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 4-1/2 MILLS PROPERTY TAX (BEING A PORTION OF THE MILLAGE HERETOFORE LEVIED FOR THE PURPOSE OF PAYING DEBT SERVICE ON THE OUTSTANDING GENERAL OBLIGATION BONDS OF THE DISTRICT) FOR MAINTAINING, OPERATING AND IMPROVING RECREATIONAL FACILITIES IN THE DISTRICT, SAID TAX TO BE IN ADDITION TO ANY OTHER TAXES NOW AUTHORIZED TO BE LEVIED FOR SUCH PURPOSES.
Race.FullText: Shall Recreation District No. 3 of the Parish of St. Mary, State of Louisiana (the "District") levy a tax not to exceed four and one-half (4-1/2) mills (being a portion of the millage heretofore levied for the purpose of paying debt service on the outstanding general obligation bonds of the District) (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of said tax for one entire year being $157,500) on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of maintaining, operating and improving recreational facilities in the District, said tax to be in addition to any other taxes now authorized to be levied for such purposes?
